comment: Proof of ~ ax-8 from ~ ax8v1 and ~ ax8v2 , proving sufficiency of the conjunction of the latter two weakened versions of ~ ax8v , which is itself a weakened version of ~ ax-8 . (Contributed by BJ, 7-Dec-2020.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 11-Apr-2021.)
